headline:
A New And
Exciting Blockchain
headlineDescriptionShort:
Semux is an innovative high-performance
blockchain platform powered by
Semux BFT consensus algorithm.
headlineDescription:
Semux is an innovative high-performance blockchain platform that powers decentralized application. It's written purely in Java and powered by Semux BFT consensus algorithm.
$t(readMoreInWiki)
highPerformanceDescription:
Tested {{txsPerBlock}} tx per block
on open network
getStarted1: Download and install Java SE Runtime Environment 8 or above
getStarted2: (Windows user) Download and install Microsoft Visual C++ 2012 Redistributable Package
getStarted3: Download the latest version of Semux Wallet below
altcoinAirdropRewards: Airdrop to altcoin holders: under consideration
roadmapFirstReleaseCompleted:
First release with Semux
BFT consensus - completed
faqWhatIsSemux: Semux is an innovative high-performance blockchain platform that powers decentralized applications.
faqIsYourBlockchainSecure: Yes! Semux uses BFT consensus algorithm.
How many SEM will there be?: How many SEM will there be?
faqCurrentSupply: Around 25 million. Check the amount here: richlist
faqSupply:
The rest goes to validators of the network. The block reward is {{blockRewardSem}} SEM:
 {{dailyRewardSem}} SEM per day, {{monthlyRewardSem}} SEM per month.
Which aspect makes Semux more interestin: Which aspect makes Semux more interesting then other cryptos?
Are you planning to list at an exchange?: Are you planning to list at an exchange?
faqExchange: We will be contacting exchanges in Q1-Q2 2018.
How many people are you in the developme: How many people are you in the development team?
faqDevs: Currently there are {{devs}} core developers and some contributors. Semux is looking to expand the dev team.
faqHowCanIGetSem:
Buy them on the OTC Thread. Beware of scammers!
Join the BTC Airdrop
Join the Signature Campaign
Contribute to the community
Become a validator
Vote for a validator who is willing to share (e.g. semux.info pool)
What is a validator or a delegate?: What is a validator or a delegate?
faqWhatIsAValidatorOrADelegate: Delegate is a special account that represents the voters. Delegates with highest total votes are considered validators, who will be responsible for forging blocks. To register a delegate, you need to burn 1000 SEMs. More
How big is the transaction Fee?: How big is the transaction Fee?
faqMinTxFee: The current min transaction fee is {{minTxFee}} SEM.
Where do I find the source code?: Where do I find the source code?
